folder.name: Schema Objects
folder.tooltip: Enter he Object Owner or what's prompted
folder.description: All segments of a given Owner in Megabytes

display.name: User's Segment Size
display.description: Sum of Megabytes for a given Owner

query.sql: select to_char(round(sum(bytes/1024/1024), 2), '9990.09') mb from dba_segments where owner = :owner

display.name: Schema Size
display.description: Shows the size of a DB Schema in GB

query.sql: select owner, round(sum(bytes)/1024/1024/1024, 2) gb, tablespace_name from dba_segments where owner = :OWNER group by owner, tablespace_name

display.name: Schemas Sizes
display.description: Shows Tabelspace Information for a list of Users

query.sql: select owner, round(sum(bytes)/1024/1024/1024, 2) gb, tablespace_name from dba_segments where owner in ('AG_APPSERVER','AG_IMPORTER','AG_MAIN','AG_META','AG_REPORT','DL16','DT48','IT0D04','IT0D76','MHUB_APPSERVER','MHUB_IMPORTER','MHUB_MAIN','MHUB_META','MHUB_REPORT','OPCONSOLE') group by owner, tablespace_name

folder.name: Server
folder.description: Server Objects like Tablespaces and Datafiles

display.name: Datafiles and Tempfiles
display.description: Show Information about Datafiles and Tempfiles

query.sql: with d as (select value as block_size from v$parameter where name = 'db_block_size'), df as (select file_id, trunc(sum(bytes/1024/1024)) mb_free from sys.dba_free_space group by file_id) select f.TABLESPACE_NAME "Tablespace", f.FILE_ID "File ID", f.FILE_NAME "Filename", f.BYTES/1024/1024 "Size MB", f.BYTES/1024/1024 - df.mb_free as "Used MB", df.mb_free "Free MB", f.AUTOEXTENSIBLE "Autoextensible", (f.INCREMENT_BY * d.block_size)/1024/1024 "Next MB", trunc(f.MAXBYTES/1024/1024) "Maximum Size MB", f.INCREMENT_BY "Next Extent Blocks" from SYS.DBA_DATA_FILES f, d, df where f.file_id = df.file_id and (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) union all select f.TABLESPACE_NAME "Tablespace", f.FILE_ID "File ID", f.FILE_NAME "Filename", f.BYTES/1024/1024 "Size MB", f.BYTES/1024/1024 - df.mb_free as "Used MB", df.mb_free "Free MB", f.AUTOEXTENSIBLE "Autoextensible", (f.INCREMENT_BY * d.block_size)/1024/1024 "Next MB", trunc(f.MAXBYTES/1024/1024) "Maximum Size MB", f.INCREMENT_BY "Next Extent Blocks" from SYS.DBA_TEMP_FILES f, d, df where f.file_id = df.file_id and (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) order by 1,2

display.name: Tablespace (Temp) Free Space
display.description: shows free space in temporary tablespaces
display.tooltip: optionally enter the temp tablespace name

query.sql: select nvl(b.tablespace_name, nvl(a.tablespace_name,'UNKNOWN')) "Tablespace", Mbytes_alloc "Allocated MB", Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Used MB", nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Free MB", ((Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0))/Mbytes_alloc) "Used", data_files "Data Files" from (select sum(free_space)/1024/1024 Mbytes_free, max(free_space)/1024/1024 largest, tablespace_name from sys.dba_temp_free_space group by tablespace_name ) a, ( select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 Mbytes_alloc, tablespace_name, count(*) data_files from sys.dba_temp_files group by tablespace_name )b where a.tablespace_name (+) = b.tablespace_name and (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(b.tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) order by 1

display.name: Tablespaces Free Space
display.description: shows free space in all tablespaces

query.sql: select nvl(b.tablespace_name, nvl(a.tablespace_name,'UNKNOWN')) "Tablespace", round(Mbytes_alloc, 2) "Allocated MB", round(Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0), 2) "Used MB", nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Free MB", ((Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0))/Mbytes_alloc) "Used", data_files "Data Files" from (select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 Mbytes_free, max(bytes)/1024/1024 largest, tablespace_name from sys.dba_free_space group by tablespace_name ) a, ( select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 Mbytes_alloc, tablespace_name, count(*) data_files from sys.dba_data_files group by tablespace_name )b where a.tablespace_name (+) = b.tablespace_name and (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(b.tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) union all -- TEMP Tablespaces select nvl(b.tablespace_name, nvl(a.tablespace_name,'UNKNOWN')) "Tablespace", Mbytes_alloc "Allocated MB", Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Used MB", nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Free MB", ((Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0))/Mbytes_alloc) "Used", data_files "Data Files" from (select sum(free_space)/1024/1024 Mbytes_free, max(free_space)/1024/1024 largest, tablespace_name from sys.dba_temp_free_space group by tablespace_name ) a, ( select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 Mbytes_alloc, tablespace_name, count(*) data_files from sys.dba_temp_files group by tablespace_name )b where a.tablespace_name (+) = b.tablespace_name and (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(b.tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) order by 1

display.name: Tablespace (Data) Free Space
display.description: shows free space in data tablespaces

query.sql: select nvl(b.tablespace_name, nvl(a.tablespace_name,'UNKNOWN')) "Tablespace", Mbytes_alloc "Allocated MB", Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Used MB", nvl(Mbytes_free,0) "Free MB", ((Mbytes_alloc-nvl(Mbytes_free,0))/Mbytes_alloc) "Used", data_files "Data Files" from (select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 Mbytes_free, max(bytes)/1024/1024 largest, tablespace_name from sys.dba_free_space group by tablespace_name ) a, ( select sum(bytes)/1024/1024 Mbytes_alloc, tablespace_name, count(*) data_files from sys.dba_data_files group by tablespace_name )b where a.tablespace_name (+) = b.tablespace_name and (:TABLESPACE_NAME is null or instr(lower(b.tablespace_name),lower(:TABLESPACE_NAME)) > 0) order by 1

folder.name: DDL
folder.description: DDL for all various kinds of objects and structures

display.name: Tablespace Full DDL
display.description: Get a Tablespaces DDL

query.sql: select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('TABLESPACE', :TABLESPACE_NAME) from dual

display.name: User Full DDL
display.description: Get USER DDL with all granted roles, tablespace quotas, etc.
display.tooltip: Enter Username to get Full User DDL

query.sql: select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('USER', u.username) AS ddl from dba_users u where u.username = :v_username union all select dbms_metadata.get_granted_ddl('TABLESPACE_QUOTA', tq.username) AS ddl from dba_ts_quotas tq where tq.username = :v_username and rownum = 1 union all select dbms_metadata.get_granted_ddl('ROLE_GRANT', rp.grantee) AS ddl from dba_role_privs rp where rp.grantee = :v_username and rownum = 1 union all select dbms_metadata.get_granted_ddl('SYSTEM_GRANT', sp.grantee) AS ddl from dba_sys_privs sp where sp.grantee = :v_username and rownum = 1 union all select dbms_metadata.get_granted_ddl('OBJECT_GRANT', tp.grantee) AS ddl from dba_tab_privs tp where tp.grantee = :v_username and rownum = 1 union all select dbms_metadata.get_granted_ddl('DEFAULT_ROLE', rp.grantee) AS ddl from dba_role_privs rp where rp.grantee = :v_username and rp.default_role = 'YES' and rownum = 1 union all select chr(10)||to_clob('/* Start profile creation script in case they are missing') AS ddl from dba_users u where u.username = :v_username and u.profile <> 'DEFAULT' and rownum = 1 union all select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('PROFILE', u.profile) AS ddl from dba_users u where u.username = :v_username and u.profile <> 'DEFAULT' union all select chr(10)||to_clob('End profile creation script */') AS ddl from dba_users u where u.username = :v_username and u.profile <> 'DEFAULT' and rownum = 1

display.name: User Min DDL
display.description: Get Minimum User DDL

query.sql: SELECT ltrim(DBMS_METADATA.GET_DDL('USER', :v_username)) ||chr(10)|| ' ACCOUNT UNLOCK;' usrddl FROM dual

display.name: User Profile Full DDL
display.description: User Profile Full DDL

query.sql: select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('PROFILE', :v_profile) AS profile_ddl from dual

display.name: DBMS_JOB Defintion
display.description: generate DDL for DBMS_JOB Schedules (Legacy). Needs to be run in the Job Owner's Context

display.name: DBMS_SCHEDULER Job Overview
display.description: Shows all DBMS_SCHEDULER Jobs on the current system
display.tooltip: Enter Owner or JobName or leave NULL

query.sql: select owner, job_name, job_style,job_type, substr(job_action, 1, 100) as job_action, comments, schedule_type, start_Date, repeat_interval, enabled, state, run_count, failure_count, last_start_date, last_run_duration, next_run_date from "ALL_SCHEDULER_JOBS" where owner = nvl(:OWNER, owner) and job_name like (nvl(:JOB, job_name)||'%')

display.name: SGA Parameter Report
display.description: Shows the configured values for various SGA Components

query.sql: select name as "Name" , value as "Value" , case when type = 6 then round(value/1024/1024, 2) else null end as "MB Value" , case when type = 6 then round(value/1024/1024/1024, 2) else null end as "GB Values" , display_value as "Display Value" , isdefault as "Default" , ISSES_MODIFIABLE as "Session Modifiable" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE as "System Modifiable" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE as "Instance Modifiable" , ISMODIFIED as "Modified" , case when name = 'lock_sga' then DESCRIPTION || '. You cannot enable automatic memory management if the LOCK_SGA initialization parameter is TRUE!' else DESCRIPTION end DESCRIPTION , case when name = 'lock_sga' then 0 when name = 'db_cache_size' then 1 when name like 'shared_pool_%' then 2 end as sort_id from "V$PARAMETER" where name in ('db_cache_size', 'lock_sga','sga_max_size','sga_target', 'pga_aggregate_target', 'memory_max_target', 'memory_target', 'shared_pool_size', 'shared_pool_reserved_size') order by sort_id, 1 desc

display.name: SGA Current Size
display.description: Shows the Sum of all currently active Memory Components

query.sql: SELECT SUM(current_size)/1024/1024 CURRENT_SIZE_MB FROM v$sga_dynamic_components
SELECT component, current_size/1024/1024 as size_mb, min_size/1024/1024 as min_size_mb FROM v$sga_dynamic_components WHERE current_size > 0 ORDER BY component

display.name: SGA Component Size
display.description: Shows the current sizes of SGA Components

query.sql: SELECT component, current_size/1024/1024 as size_mb, min_size/1024/1024 as min_size_mb FROM v$sga_dynamic_components WHERE current_size > 0 ORDER BY component

display.name: SGA
display.description: Shows SGA Size by Buffers

query.sql: select name, value, round(value/1024/1024, 2) mb from v$sga union select ' Total: ', sum(value), round(sum(value)/1024/1024, 2) mb from v$sga
select * from v$sga_target_advice order by sga_size

select name as "Name" , value as "Value" , case when type = 6 then round(value/1024/1024, 2) else null end as "MB Value" , case when type = 6 then round(value/1024/1024/1024, 2) else null end as "GB Values" , display_value as "Display Value" , isdefault as "Default" , ISSES_MODIFIABLE as "Session Modifiable" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE as "System Modifiable" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE as "Instance Modifiable" , ISMODIFIED as "Modified" , case when name = 'lock_sga' then DESCRIPTION || '. You cannot enable automatic memory management if the LOCK_SGA initialization parameter is TRUE!' else DESCRIPTION end DESCRIPTION , case when name = 'lock_sga' then 0 when name = 'db_cache_size' then 1 when name like 'shared_pool_%' then 2 end as sort_id from "V$PARAMETER" where name in ('db_cache_size', 'lock_sga','sga_max_size','sga_target', 'pga_aggregate_target', 'memory_max_target', 'memory_target', 'shared_pool_size', 'shared_pool_reserved_size') order by sort_id, 1 desc
SELECT component, current_size/1024/1024 as size_mb, min_size/1024/1024 as min_size_mb FROM v$sga_dynamic_components WHERE current_size > 0 ORDER BY component
SELECT SUM(current_size)/1024/1024 CURRENT_SIZE_MB FROM v$sga_dynamic_components

folder.name: User Objects
folder.description: Contains Reports that show everything about User Objects

display.name: Invalid Objects
display.description: Shows all invalid Objects

query.sql: select * from dba_objects where status != 'VALID' and owner = nvl(:OWNER, owner) and object_name = nvl(:OBJECT_NAME, object_name)

display.name: All Errors
display.description: Shows all Compilation Errors for PL/SQL Objects (Objects need to be compiled before Errors show up here)

query.sql: select * from all_errors where owner = nvl(:OWNER, owner) and name = nvl(:OBJECT_NAME, name)

display.name: Users Object Counts (All Users)
display.description: Shows the number objects for each object type
display.tooltip: Enter Username to narrow down search results

query.sql: select count(*) as num_objects, owner, object_type from dba_objects where owner = nvl(:OWNER, owner) group by owner, object_type order by 2,3

display.name: Users Objects Counts (Non Oracle User)
display.description: Shows the number of objects for each object type for a named User (Non Oracle)
display.tooltip: Enter Username to narrow down search results

query.sql: select count(*) as num_objects, owner, object_type from dba_objects where owner = nvl(:OWNER, owner) and owner in (select username from dba_users where username = owner and oracle_maintained != 'Y') group by owner, object_type order by 2,3

folder.name: Users and Roles
folder.tooltip: Enter Username to narrow search results
folder.description: Contains everything around Users and Roles

display.name: All Users (Non Oracle Users)
display.description: Shows basich and extended information about a named user or a list of users (Oracle12 or greater)

query.sql: select username, account_status, default_tablespace, temporary_tablespace, profile from DBA_USERS where username = nvl(:USERNAME, username) and username not in ('PDBADMIN') -- 12.1 Bug: PDBADMIN is not listed as ORACLE_MAINTAINED and oracle_maintained != 'Y' order by 1

display.name: Granted Roles (All Users)
display.description: Shows all granted role for a named user or all users in DB

query.sql: select grantee, granted_role, admin_option from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where grantee = nvl(:USERNAME, grantee) order by 1, 2

display.name: All Users
display.description: Shows Information about a named or all users in DB

query.sql: select username, account_status, default_tablespace, temporary_tablespace, profile, case oracle_maintained when 'Y' then 'Oracle User' else 'Normal User' end as user_type from DBA_USERS where username = nvl(:USERNAME, username) order by 6, 1

display.name: All Users (Non Oracle with granted Roles)
display.description: Shows Information about all users and their granted roles
display.tooltip: Enter username to narrow search result

query.sql: select username, account_status, default_tablespace, temporary_tablespace, profile, (select listagg(granted_role,', ') within group(order by granted_role) granted_roles from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where grantee = username) as granted_roles from DBA_USERS where username = nvl(:USERNAME, username) and username not in ('PDBADMIN') -- 12.1 Bug: PDBADMIN is not listed as ORACLE_MAINTAINED and oracle_maintained != 'Y' order by 1

display.name: All Users (All Users with granted Roles)
display.description: Shows information about all Users in DB with their granted Roles

query.sql: select username, account_status, default_tablespace, temporary_tablespace, profile, case oracle_maintained when 'Y' then 'Oracle User' else 'Normal User' end as user_type, (select listagg(granted_role,', ') within group (order by granted_role) granted_roles from DBA_ROLE_PRIVS where grantee = username) as granted_roles from DBA_USERS where username = nvl(:USERNAME, username) order by 6, 1

folder.name: Constraint
folder.tooltip: Optionally Enter Table or Ownername if prompted

display.name: Constraint Count (Non Oracle Users)
display.description: Counts all Constraints by Type for all Non Oracle Users (ORACLE_MAINTAINED != 'Y') Oracle 12 or greater
display.tooltip: Enter Tablename to narrow search result

query.sql: /* C - Check constraint on a table P - Primary key U - Unique key R - Referential integrity V - With check option, on a view O - With read only, on a view H - Hash expression F - Constraint that involves a REF column S - Supplemental logging */ with o as (select /*+ MATERIALIZE */ username from dba_users where oracle_maintained != 'Y' and username != 'PDBADMIN') select count(*) as "Count", "Owner", "Constraint_Type" from ( select c.owner "Owner", c.table_name "Table_Name", c.constraint_name "Constraint_Name", decode(c.constraint_type, 'P','Primary_Key', 'U','Unique', 'R','Foreign_Key', 'C','Check', 'V', 'Check Option on a View', 'O', 'With read only on a View', 'H', 'Hash Expression', 'F', 'REF Column Constraint', 'S', 'Supplemental logging', c.constraint_type) "Constraint_Type", initcap(c.status) "Status", c.owner sdev_link_owner, c.table_name sdev_link_name, decode(c.constraint_type,'V','VIEW','TABLE') sdev_link_type from sys.dba_constraints c, o where c.OWNER = o.username and substr(c.table_name,1,4) != 'BIN$' and substr(c.table_name,1,3) != 'DR$' and (:TABLE_NAME is null or upper(c.table_name) LIKE upper(:TABLE_NAME)) order by c.owner, c.table_name, c.constraint_name ) group by "Owner", "Constraint_Type" order by 2, 3;

display.name: Constraints (All Users)
display.description: Show all Constraints for all Users
display.tooltip: Enter Owner and/or Tablename to narow search results

query.sql: select c.owner "Owner", c.table_name "Table_Name", c.constraint_name "Constraint_Name", decode(c.constraint_type, 'P','Primary_Key', 'U','Unique', 'R','Foreign_Key', 'C','Check', 'V', 'Check Option on a View', 'O', 'With read only on a View', 'H', 'Hash Expression', 'F', 'REF Column Constraint', 'S', 'Supplemental logging', c.constraint_type) "Constraint_Type", initcap(c.status) "Status", c.owner sdev_link_owner, c.table_name sdev_link_name, decode(c.constraint_type,'V','VIEW','TABLE') sdev_link_type from sys.dba_constraints c where (:OWNER is null or upper(c.owner) like '%'||upper(:OWNER)||'%') and substr(c.table_name,1,4) != 'BIN$' and substr(c.table_name,1,3) != 'DR$' and (:TABLE_NAME is null or upper(c.table_name) LIKE upper(:TABLE_NAME)) order by c.owner, c.table_name, c.constraint_name
